title: SOLD: 1881 New York Clipper Woodcuts - Ned Hanlon HOF (BGS Authentic)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1881 New York Clipper Woodcuts - Ned Hanlon HOF (BGS Authentic)
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale today is an extremely rare 1881 New York Clipper Woodcut picturing Hall of Famer, Ned Hanlon and encapsulated as "Authentic" by Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review enlarged scan of the woodcut for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
